docs.snippet: BALTIMORE, Sept. 5  Miss Jane Carew Riggs and Lucio S. Garcia-Mansilla of New York were married here today in the Roman Catholic Cathedral of Mary Our Queen by Msgr. Thomas A. Whelan.
docs.lead_paragraph: BALTIMORE, Sept. 5 Miss Jane Carew Riggs and Lucio S. Garcia-Mansilla of New York were married here today in the Roman Catholic Cathedral of Mary Our Queen by Msgr. Thomas A. Whelan.

headline.main: Jane Carew Riggs Bride in Baltimore

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 6 (UPI)  Felix Polleri Carrio, Uruguay's Ambassador to the Organization of American States, died here early today.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 6 (UPI) Felix Polleri Carrio, Uruguay's Ambassador to the Organization of American States, died here early today.
docs.abstract: Uruguay Amb to OAS Polleri Carrio dies

headline.main: FELIX P. CARRIO DIES; URUGUAYAN ENVOY

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 6 (Reuters) A tape recording of a conversation between an urban guerrilla leader in Uruguay and Dan A. Mitrione, a United States police adviser who was killed by the guerrillas on Aug. 7, was found here today.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 6 (Reuters) A tape recording of a conversation between an urban guerrilla leader in Uruguay and Dan A. Mitrione, a United States police adviser who was killed by the guerrillas on Aug. 7, was found here today.
docs.abstract: tape recording of Tupamaro leader talk with Mitrione found by reporter in Montevideo after anonymous phone call; officials decline to disclose contents for security reasons

headline.main: Mitrione-Guerrilla Taping Believed Found in Uruguay

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Sept. 7  Chile's multiparty system is democratic, but it makes for strange and short-lived alliances at election time.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Sept. 7 Chile's multiparty system is democratic, but it makes for strange and short-lived alliances at election time.
docs.abstract: comment on Allende coalition; trend toward pol left in last 30 yrs seen in willingness of many Christian Dems to ratify Allende victory; Christian Dem party began in '30s as anti-Communist Socialist Falange movement, has become party of Cath reformers, Cath leftists

headline.main: Chile's Winning Coalition; Communist-Backed Group of Radicals And Catholic Leftists Provided Plurality

byline.original: By JUAN de ONIS Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: 8 Tupamaros, including 2 women, steal explosives from Montevideo store; hoist Tupamaro flag, drive off in 3 stolen trucks
docs.abstract: 8 Tupamaros, including 2 women, steal explosives from Montevideo store; hoist Tupamaro flag, drive off in 3 stolen trucks

docs.snippet: MOSCOW, Wednesday, Sept. 16 The Soviet Union announced this morning the appointment of Vasily S. Tolstikov, head of the Leningrad regional party organization, as ambassador to Communist China.
docs.lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Wednesday, Sept. 16 The Soviet Union announced this morning the appointment of Vasily S. Tolstikov, head of the Leningrad regional party organization, as ambassador to Communist China.
docs.abstract: USSR appts V S Tolstikov amb to China

headline.main: Soviet Names Leningrad Chief The New Envoy to Red China

docs.snippet: In the recent fourth PanAmerican chess tournament in Havana, 18 players from 15 countries competed. At the end of the round robin there was a three-way first-place tie among International Masters Eleazar Jimenez and Eldis Cobo of Cuba and Orestes...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the recent fourth PanAmerican chess tournament in Havana, 18 players from 15 countries competed. At the end of the round robin there was a three-way first-place tie among International Masters Eleazar Jimenez and Eldis Cobo of Cuba and Orestes Rodriguez of Peru.

headline.main: Chess:; Three Wind Up in First Place At 4th Pan American Tourney
